Reviews.Title: Don't buy this phone.
Reviews.Author: Shelly L. Kilgore
Reviews.Content: This phone is no good. Everytime I try to make a call, after entering the number and pushing the send button the screen will show that the phone is calling the dialed number and 5 seconds later it says call ended. I have quit using it and am looking into getting a different phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
QUAND BAND GSM: 850/900/1800/1900 MHZ, ONE CAMERA
DUAL SIM SLOT- DUAL STANDBY-, BLUETOOTH SUPPORT
MP3 - AUDIO PLAYER SUPPORT, MP4 - VIDEO PLAYER SUPPORT
MICRO SD CARD SLOT UP TO 4 GB, RADIO FM SUPPORT
ORGANIZER/TOOLS: CALENDAR, ALARM, TORCHLIGHT, TASKS, CALCULATOR
ProductInfo.Name: UNLOCKED CELL PHONE DUAL SIM QUAD BAND MOBILE GSM i3220 WITHE - PINK
